definition: to make a false and unwarranted declaration

sentences.english: He does not pretend to be a physicist.
sentences.chinese: 我不能妄稱自己多有音樂天賦。

sentences.english: Japanese textbooks for the Japanese territory Diaoyu Islands in China vain.
sentences.chinese: 日本教科書妄稱中國釣魚島爲日本領土。

sentences.english: Your enemies take Your name in vain.
sentences.chinese: 你的仇敵也妄稱你的名。

sentences.english: I can't pretend to any great musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 我不能妄稱自己多有音樂天賦。

sentences.english: You shall not take the name of the LORD your God in vain…
sentences.chinese: 不可妄稱耶和華你神的名。

sentences.english: She passed the idea off as her own.
sentences.chinese: 她把這個主意妄稱是她自己的。

sentences.english: Nowhere do we claim for our concepts the title of a science.
sentences.chinese: 我絲毫不敢妄稱我們的概念具有科學的名銜。
